note:
Hey there, I'm Kate.

I'll never know what I'm doing with this. But since I've amassed a handful of decades and turned out trans, I suppose I could ask for forgiveness.

Here you will find a lot of posts about when I am sad. I try to remember to post the happy times as well, but it's harder. I'm working on learning how to be social, so there's going to be some of that mixed in. And finally the rest of my time and energy goes into parenting a small child.

For the basic stats:
- I've aged to at least 40
- Am very trans
- Living in the PNW of U.S.
- Will need many many hugs

Stick around if you dare !
